document.full_text: the parents of a 15-year-old boy who died last fall after drinking a controversial beverage that combined caffeine and alcohol sued the chicago-based manufacturer on thursday.
document.title: family sues four loko maker over teenage son's death
lines_and_colors: the parents of a 15-year-old boy who died last fall after drinking a controversial beverage that combined caffeine and alcohol sued the chicago-based manufacturer on thursday.
